content: knitted from novita merino dk the relaxed sulo cable cardigan will keep men warm along with providing a hint of the bohemian the cardigan is knitted in one piece up to the armholes and finished with a shawl collar pattern is here in **english** https //novita com/en/patterns/novita-merino-dk-sulo-cabled-cardigan here in **finnish** https //novita com/patterns/sulo-palmikkoneuletakki and here in **swedish** https //novita com/sv/patterns/charm-koftan
